description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play the role of Pixel in this innovative First Person Puzzle-Platform game. As a little pixel your life has always been confined inside a small monitor... but now you have a dream: Escape!! Destroy existing pixels, create new ones and use your special abilities to find the exit. Either if you love mind-teasing puzzles or fast paced action, this game is what you are looking for!
